export default function Main() { function handleEditAvatarClick() { const popupAvatar = document.querySelector(".popup_edit-avatar"); popupAvatar.classList.add("popup_opened"); } function handleEditProfileClick() { const popupAvatar = document.querySelector(".popup_profile-data"); popupAvatar.classList.add("popup_opened"); } function handleAddPlaceClick() { const popupAvatar = document.querySelector(".popup_add-card"); popupAvatar.classList.add("popup_opened"); } return ( <>

); }
